name: Spongebob Killerpants
description:
You're working a night shift at the Krusty Krab. Your role at the Krusty Krab is to clean up rubbish and sweep the floors after closing hours. You've done this job many times before. However, tonight is different. It feels strange, unsafe. Continue working as a janitor through the night and come across unsettling experiences. Investigate the evil that lurks in the Krusty Krab.

^^ 5min expected gametime (short)

^^ ESC to open settings
